GK19bahcar7u:1: aṅganavedī vasudhā kulyā jaladhiḥ sthalī ca pātālam /
GK19bahcar7u:3: dhṛtadhanuṣi bāhuśālini śailā na namanti yattadāścaryam /
GK19bahcar7u:5_0: atha vyīteṣu ca keṣuciddivaseṣu mauhūrtikamaṇḍalena śataśaḥ sugaṇite supraśaste 'hani
GK19bahcar7u:5_1: datte catasṛṇāmapi diśāṃ vijayayogye daṇḍayātrālagne salilamokṣaviśāradaiḥ śāradairivāmbhodharaiḥ
GK19bahcar7u:5_2: kāladhautaiḥ śātakaumbhaiśca kumbhaiḥ snātvā viracayya paramayā bhaktyā bhagavato
GK19bahcar7u:6: dattvā dvijebyo ratnavanti rājatāni jātarūpamayāni ca sahasraśastilapātrāṇi kanakapatralatālaṅkṛtaśaphaśṛṅgaśikharā gāścārbudaśaḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:7: samupaviśya vitatavyāghracarmaṇi bhadrāsane vilipya prathamaviliptāyudho nijayaśodhavalenācaraṇataścandanena śarīraṃ,
GK19bahcar7u:12: paripūjitaprahṛṣṭapurohitakaraprakīryamāṇaśāntisalilasīkaranikarābhyukṣitaśirāḥ saṃpreṣya mahārhāṇi vāhanāni bahalaratnālokaliptakakubhi ca bhūṣaṇāni bhūbhujāṃ savibhajya,
GK19bahcar7u:15: nātidūre ca nagarādupasarasvati nirmite mahati tṛṇamaye,
GK19bahcar7u:22_0: tatrasthasya cāsya grāmākṣapaṭalikaḥ sakalakaraṇiparikaraḥ “karotu devo divasagrahaṇamadyaivāvandhyaśāsanaḥ
GK19bahcar7u:22_1: śāsanānām' ityabhidhāya vṛṣāṅkāmabhinavaghaṭitāṃ hāṭakamayīṃ mudrāṃ samupaninye /
GK19bahcar7u:24: samupasthāpite ca prathamata eva mṛtpiṇḍe paribhraśya karakamalādadhomukhī mahītale papāta mudrā /
GK19bahcar7u:25: mandāśyānapaṅkapaṭale mṛdumṛdi sarasvatītīre parisphuṭaṃ vyarājanta rājayo varṇānām /
GK19bahcar7u:26: amaṅgalāśaṅkini ca viṣīdati parijane narapatirakaronmanasyetat--“atattvadarśinyo hi bhavantyavidagdhānāṃ dhiyaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:27: tathā hi--ekaśāsanamudrāṅkā bhūrbhavato bhaviṣyatīti niveditamapi nimittenānyathā gṛhṇanti grāmyāḥ' /
GK19bahcar7u:28: ityabhinandya manasā mahānimittaṃ tatsīrasahasrasaṃmitasīmnāṃ grāmāṇāṃ śatamadād dvijebhyaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:31: atha galati tṛtīye yāme suptasamastasanattvaniḥśabde dikkuñjarajṛmbhamāṇagambhīradhvaniratāḍhyata prayāṇapaṭahaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:32: agrataḥ sthitvā ca muhūrtamiva punaḥ prayāṇakrośasaṃkhyāpakāḥ spaṣṭamaṣṭāvadīyanta prahārāḥ paṭahe paṭīyāṃsaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:33_1: prayāṇapaṭahaḥ agrataḥ sthitvā ca muhūrtamiva punaḥ prayāṇakrīśasaṃkhyāpakāḥ spaṣṭamaṣṭāvadīyanta
GK19bahcar7u:103: udite ca bhagavati dinakṛti rājñaḥ samāyogagrahaṇasamayaśaṃsī sasvāna saṃjñāśaṅkho muhurmuhuḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:104: atha na cirādiva prathamaprayāṇa eva digvijayāya diggajasamāgamamiva gamanavilolakarṇatāladolāvilāsaiḥ kurvāṇayā kareṇukayā siddhayātrayohyamānaḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:105_2: dvitīya iva bhogināmadhipatiraṅgalagnena kañcukenāmṛtamathanadivasa iva kṣīrodaphenapaṭaladhavalāmbaravāhī,
GK19bahcar7u:107_1: savitāramapi pibanniva tejasā bahalatāmbūlasindūracchuritayā vilabhamāna iva dvīpāntarāṇyoṣṭhamudrayānurāgasya
GK19bahcar7u:108_0: rājakekṣaṇotkṣiptatribhāgayā trīnapi lokān karadānāyājñāpayanniva savibhramaṃ bhrūlatayā
GK19bahcar7u:108_1: drāghīyasā bāhuprākāreṇa parikṣipanniva rirakṣayā saptāpi sāgaramahākhātānakhilamiva
GK19bahcar7u:109: gāḍhamamṛtamaya iva pīyamānaḥ kutūhalottānakaṭakalokalocanasahasraaiḥ snehārdreṣu rājñāṃ hṛdayeṣu guṇagauraveṇa majjanniva,
GK19bahcar7u:112: puraḥsarairālokakārakaiḥ sahasrasaṃkhyairarka iva kiraṇairadhikāracāturyacañcalacaraṇairvyavasthāsthāpananiṣṭhuraiḥ bhayapalāyamānalokotpīḍāntaritā dasāpi diśo grāhayadbhiriva,
GK19bahcar7u:121: prabhāmucāṃ cūḍāmaṇīnāmavāñcastiryañca udañcaśca cañcanto marīcayaścāparāśaya iva suśakunasaṃpādanāya celuḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:122: meghāyamānareṇumeduraṃ mandiraśikhaṇḍina iva khamuḍḍīyamānāḥ komalakalpapādapapallavavandanamālāḥ kalāpā ivābadhyanta digdvāreṣu dikpālaiḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:123_2: mānamayān prāṇān praṇayadānaiḥ pravīrāṇāṃ vīro yathānurūpaṃ vibabhāja rājakam /
GK19bahcar7u:124: atha prasthite rājani bahalakalakalatrastadiṅnāgaśūtkārarava ivetastatastastāra tāratarastūryāṇāṃ pratidhvanirāśātaṭeṣu /
GK19bahcar7u:125: diggajebhyaḥ prakupitānāṃ triprasrutānāṃ kariṇāṃ madaprasravaṇavīthībhiralikulakālībhiḥ kālindīveṇikāsahasrāṇīva sasyandire /
GK19bahcar7u:133: aripratāpānalanirmūlanāyeva madoṣmaśīkaraiḥ śiśekire kariṇaḥ kakubhāṃ cakram /
GK19bahcar7u:135: svayamapi visiṣmiye balānāṃ bhūpālaḥ sarvatovikṣiptacakṣuścādrākṣīdāvāsasthānasakāśāt pratiṣṭhamānaṃ svandhāvāram,
GK19bahcar7u:141: bhadra, bhagnacaraṇa iva saṃcarasiyāvadamī puraḥsarāḥ sarabhasamupari patanti /
GK19bahcar7u:144: vatsa rāmila, rajasi yathā na nasyasi tathā samīpe bhava, kiṃ na paśyasi galati śaktuprasevakaḥ?
GK19bahcar7u:146: saurabheya, saraṇimapahāya hayamadhyaṃ dhāvasi? dhīvari, viśasi, gantukāmā mātahgi, mātaṅgamārgam /
GK19bahcar7u:154: kimadyaiva vidrāsi droṇaka, drāghīyasī daṇḍayātrā, vinaikena niṣṭhurakeṇa niṣkreyamasmākam /
GK19bahcar7u:166: hata hastipaka, nedīyasi karikaradaṇḍe samadaḥsaṃmardakardame skhalasi /
GK19bahcar7u:168: ita ehi māṇavaka, ghanebhaghaṭāsaṃghaṭṭasaṃkaṭe nāsti nistaraṇasaraṇiḥ' /
GK19bahcar7u:178: phalakāle 'nya eva viṭāḥ samupasthāsyante' iti mukharaiḥ pade pade patatāṃ durbalabalīvardānāṃ niyuktaiḥ skhalane khalaceṭakeḥ khedyamānāṃsaṃvibhaktakulaputralokam,
GK19bahcar7u:183: aparairlūyamānaniṣpannasasyaprakaṭitaviṣādaiḥ kṣetraśucā sakuṭumbakaireva nirgataiḥ prarūḍhaprāṇacchedaiḥ paritāpatyājitabhayaiḥ “vka rājā, kuto rājā?
GK19bahcar7u:198: dṛsyamānasakalaprāṇiparyāyaṃ caturyugasargakośamiva prajāpatīnāṃ kleśabahulamapi tapaḥkaraṇamitra kramakāriṇaṃ kalyāṇānām,
GK19bahcar7u:200: āsannavartināṃ ca “tatrabhavatā māndhātrā pravartitāḥ panthāno digvijayāya /
GK19bahcar7u:201: apratihataratharaṃhasā raghuṇā laghunaiva kālenākāri kakubhāṃ prasādanam /
GK19bahcar7u:205: sahimahimavadvyavahito 'pyuvāha bāhubalavyatikarakātaraḥ karaṃ kauraveśvarasya kiṅkara ivākṛtī drumaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:206: nātijigīṣavaḥ khalu pūrve yenālpa eva bhūbhāge bhūyāṃso bhagadattadantavakrakrāthakarṇakau ravaśiśupālasālvajarāsaṃdhasindhurājaprabhṛtayo 'bhavan bhūpatayaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:207: saṃtuṣṭo rājā yudhiṣṭhiro yo hyasahata samīpa eva dhanañjayajayajanitajagatkampaḥ kiṃpuruṣāṇāṃ rājyam /
GK19bahcar7u:208: alasaścaṇḍakośo yo na prāvikṣat kṣmāṃ jitvā strīrājyam /
GK19bahcar7u:215: dakṣiṇārṇavakallolānilacalitacandanalatāsaurabhasundarīkṛtadarīmand irāddardurādadrernedīyasi malayo malayalagna eva ca mahendraḥ' /
GK19bahcar7u:217: mandiradvāri cobhayataḥ sabahumānaṃ brūlatābhyāṃ visarjitarājalokaḥ praviśya cāvatatāra bāhyāsthānamaṇḍapasthāpitamāsanamācakrāma /
GK19bahcar7u:219: atha tatra pratīhāraḥ pṛthivīpṛṣṭhapratiṣṭhāpitapāṇipallavo vijñāpitavān--“deva! prāgjyotiṣeśvareṇa kumāreṇa prahito haṃsaveganāmā dūto 'ntaraṅgastoraṇamadhyāste' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:221: atha dakṣatayā kṣitipālādarācca pratīhāraḥ svayameva niragāt /
GK19bahcar7u:224: “ehyehi' iti sabahumānamāhūtaśca pradāvito 'pasṛtaḥ pādapīṭhaluṭhitalalāṭalekho nyastahastaḥ pṛṣṭhe pārthivenopasṛtya bhūyo namaścakre /
GK19bahcar7u:226: tato rājā tiraścīṃ tanumīṣadiva dadhānaścāmaragrāhiṇīmantarālavartinīṃ samutsārya saṃmukhīnastaṃ sapraśrayaṃ papraccha--“haṃsavega! śrīmānkaccitkuśalī kumāraḥ?' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:227: sa tamanvavādīt--“adya kuśalī yenaivaṃ snehasnapitayā sauhārdadravārdrayā sagauravaṃ girā pṛcchati devaḥ' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:228_1: devasya sadbhāvagarbhamapahāya hṛdayamekamanyadanurūpaṃ prābhṛtameva durlabhaṃ loke
GK19bahcar7u:230: tathā hi--pratidivasaṃ praviśati śaityahetośchāyāyāḥ kiraṇasahasrādekaikaḥ somasya raśmirasmin /
GK19bahcar7u:231: yasminpraviṣṭe pradhyānānantaraṃ svādavo dantavīṇopadeśācāryāścyotanticandrabhāsāmambhasāṃ maṇiśalākābhyo yāvadicchamacchā dhārāḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:232: pracetā iva yaścaturṇāmarṇavānāmadhipatirbhūto bhāvī vā tamidamanugṛhṇāti cchāyayā netaram /
GK19bahcar7u:238: etattāvadanugṛhṇātu dṛśā devaḥ saṃdeśamapi visrabdhaṃ śroṣyati' /
GK19bahcar7u:239: ityevamabhidhāya vivṛtyātmīyaṃ puruṣamabhyadhāt--“uttiṣṭha! darśaya devasya' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:240: sa ca vacanānantaramutthāya pumānūrdhvīcakāra taddhautadukūlakalpitācca nicolakādakoṣīt /
GK19bahcar7u:241: ākṛṣyamāṇa eva ca yasminnatisitamahasi sarabhasamahāsīva hareṇa,
GK19bahcar7u:246: atrinetranirgatasya dhavaladhāmamaṇḍalamanoharo dṛṣṭa iva janena janmadivasaḥ kumudabandhoḥ pratyakṣīkṛta ivodgamanakṣaṇo nārāyaṇanābipuṇḍarīkasya,
GK19bahcar7u:253: citrīyamāṇacetāśca sarājako rājā daṇḍānusārādhirohiṇyā dṛṣṭyā sādaramaikṣiṣṭa tattiṃlakamiva tribhuvanasya,
GK19bahcar7u:260: bahalajyotsnāśuklodaramaindavamiva pariveṣavalayaṃ śauklyāpahasitaśaṅkhaśrīkaṃ śravaṇamaṇḍalamiva niścalatāṃ gatamairāvatasya,
GK19bahcar7u:264: sparśavatā ca prabhāvastambhitena mandākinīmṛṇālena mukulitaphaṇena vāsukineva nītena daṇḍatāṃ dyotamānam,
GK19bahcar7u:275: dṛṣṭe tasmin rājñā prathame śeṣamapi prābhṛtaṃ prakāśayāñcakruḥ krameṇa kārmāḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:285: priyaṅguprasavapiṅgalatvañci cāsanāni vetramayānyaguruvalkalakalpitasañcayāni ca subhāṣitabhāñji pustakāni,
GK19bahcar7u:286: pariṇatapāṭalapaṭolatviṃṣi ca taruṇahārītaharinti kṣīrakṣārīṇi ca pūgānāṃ pallavavalambīni sarasāni phalāni,
GK19bahcar7u:293: kutūhalakṛnti ca kanakaśṛṅkhalāniyamitagrīvāṇāṃ kiṃnnarāṇāṃ ca vanamānuṣāṇāṃ ca jīvañjīvakānāṃ ca jalamānuṣāṇāṃ ca mithunāni,
GK19bahcar7u:296: rājā tu chatradarśanātprahṛṣṭahṛdayaḥ prathamaprayāṇe śobhananimitamiti manasā jagrāha /
GK19bahcar7u:297: haṃsavegaṃ ca prīyamāṇo babhāṣe--“bhadra! sakalaratnadhāmnaḥ paramesvaraśirodhāraṇārhasyāsya mahātapatrasya mahārṇavādiva kumudabāndhavasya kumārāllābho na vismāya /
GK19bahcar7u:299: apanīte ca tasmātpradeśātprābhṛtasaṃbhāre kṣaṇamiva sthitvā “haṃsavega! viśramyatām' iti pratīhārabhavanaṃ visarjayāṃbabhūva /
GK19bahcar7u:300: svayamapyutthāya snātvā maḍgalākāṅkṣī prāṅmukhaḥ prāviśadābhogasya chāyām /
GK19bahcar7u:301_0: atha viśata evāsya chāyājanmanā jaḍimnā cūḍhāmaṇitāmanīyateva śaśibimbamambubindumucaścucumburiva
GK19bahcar7u:301_1: candrakāntamaṇayo lalāṭataṭaṃ karpūrareṇava iva vyalīyanta locanayūgale gale galattuhinakaṇanikarakṛtanīhārā
GK19bahcar7u:303_1: candanamahgaspṛṣṭe ca vāsasī śarattārakākāratāramuktāstabakitapadaṃ pariveśaṃ nāma
GK19bahcar7u:303_2: kaṭisūtrakam atimahārhapajharāgālokalohitīkṛtadivasaṃ ca taraṅgakaṃ nāma karṇābharaṇaṃ
GK19bahcar7u:307: mukulāyamānasakalakamalavanā pramukha eva baddhasevāñjalipuṭeva sadvīpā bhūrabhūd bhūpateḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:314: prayāṇavārtā iva māninīnāṃ hṛdayabhedinyo yayurindudīdhitayo daśa diśaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:316: cinteva bhūbhṛtāṃ hṛdayāni viveśa guhāvivarāṇi vimuktasarvāśātimirasaṃtatiḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:318: asyāṃ ca velāyāṃ vitatavitānatalavartī narendro “yāta tāvat' iti visarjyānujīvino haṃsavegamādiṣṭavān--“kathaya saṃdeśam' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:319: praṇamya sa kathayituṃ prāstāvīt--“deva! purā mahāvarāhasaṃparkasaṃbhūtagarbhayā bhagavatyā bhuvā narako nāma sūnurasāvi rasātale /
GK19bahcar7u:321: yasya ca tribhuvanabhujo bhujaśauṇḍasya bhavanakamalinīcakravākīkopakuṭilakaṭākṣekṣito 'pi bhayacakitāruṇaparivartitaratho nājñayā vinā ravirastamavrājīt /
GK19bahcar7u:323_1: mahatsu mahīpāleṣu pramautro mahārājabhūtivarmaṇaḥ pautraścandramukhavarmaṇaḥ putro
GK19bahcar7u:323_2: devasya kailāsasthirasthiteḥ sthitivarmaṇaḥ susthiravarmā nāma mahārājādhirājo jajñe
GK19bahcar7u:323_3: tejasāṃ rāśirmṛgāṅka iti yaṃ janā jaguḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:325: yaśca bāla eva prītyā dvijātīnaprītyā cārātīnsamagrānpratigrahānagrāhayat /
GK19bahcar7u:327: tathā ca yo vāhinīnāthānāṃ śaṅkhāñjahāra na ratnāni,
GK19bahcar7u:330: tasya ca sugṛhītanāmno devasya devyāṃ śyāmādevyāṃ bhāskaradyutirbhāskaravarmāparanāmā tanayaḥ saṃtanorbāgīrathyāṃ bhīṣma iva kumāraḥ samabhavat /
GK19bahcar7u:331_0: ayamasya ca śaiśavādārabya saṃkalpaḥ stheyānsthāṇupādāravindadvayādṛte nāhamanyaṃ
GK19bahcar7u:331_2: sakalabuvanavijayena vā mṛtyunā vā yadi vā prajaṇḍapratāpajvalanajanitadigdāhena
GK19bahcar7u:334: devasya hi yaśāṃsi sañcicīṣato bahiraṅgabhūtāni dhanāni /
GK19bahcar7u:335: bāhāveva ca kevale niṣaṇṇasya śeṣāvayavānāmapi sāhāyakasaṃpādanamanoratho niravakāśaḥ kimuta bāhyajanasya /
GK19bahcar7u:345_0: yadi ca devasyāpi maitrīyati hṛdayamavagacchati ca paryāyāntaritaṃ dāsyamanutiṣṭhanti
GK19bahcar7u:345_1: suhṛda iti tataḥ kimāsyate samājñāpyatāmanubhavatu viṣṇormandaragiririva vikaṭakeyūrakoṭimaṇivighaṭṭanavkaṇitakaṭakamaṇiśilāśakalāni
GK19bahcar7u:347: nābhinandati ceddevaḥ praṇayamājñāpayatu kiṃ kathanīyaṃ mayā svāmina' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:348_1: sudūramābhogātapatravyatikareṇa tu parāṃ koṭimāropite premṇi lajjamāna iva sādaraṃ
GK19bahcar7u:348_2: jagāda--“haṃsavega! kathamiva tādṛśi mahātmani mahābhijane puṇyarāśau guṇīnāṃ prāgrahare
GK19bahcar7u:348_3: parokṣasuhṛdi snihyati madvidhasyānyathā svapne 'pi pravarteta manaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:349: sakalajagaduttāpanapaṭavo 'pi śiśirāyante tribuvananayanānandakare kamalākare karāstigmatejasaḥ. subahuguṇakrītāsca ke vayaṃ sakhyasya /
GK19bahcar7u:352: śreyāṃśca saṃkalpaḥ kumārasya svayaṃ bāhuśālī mayi ca samālambitaśarāsane suhṛdi harādṛte kamanyaṃ namasyati /
GK19bahcar7u:354: avalepini paśāvapi kesariṇi bahumāno hṛdayasya kiṃ punaḥ suhṛdi /
GK19bahcar7u:355: tattathā yateṣāḥ yathā na ciramiyamasmānkleśayati kumāradarśanotkaṇṭhā' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:357: sevābhīravo hi santaḥ, tatrāpi viśeṣeṇāyamahaṅkāradhano vaiṣṇavo vaṃśaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:359: paśyatu devaḥ puruṣasya hi sevāṃ prati durjananyevātivṛddhayā durgatyā vābhimukhīkriyamāṇasya,
GK19bahcar7u:365: sakalaśarīrasaṃtāpakaraṃ karīṣāgnimiva duṣkṛtinaḥ kṛtacittsya saṃpraveṣṭuṃ rājakulamupahatasakalendriyaśakteriva mithyaiva hṛdayagataviṣayagrāmagrahaṇābhilāṣasya,
GK19bahcar7u:382: balibhuja iva jihvālaulyopayuktapuruṣavarcaso vṛthā vihitāyuṣo jīvitaḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:383: śmaśānapādapāniva piśācaraya dagdhabhūtyā paruṣīkṛtānrājavallabhānupasarpataḥ viparītajihvājanitamādhuryairoṣṭhamātraprakaṭitarāgai rājaśukālāpaiḥ śiśoriva mugdhavilobhyamānasya,
GK19bahcar7u:392: atikṛpaṇasya śirasā kevalenāsaṃtuṣṭasya vacasāpi pādau spṛśataḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:425: prabalapaṅka iva sarvamadhastānnayati dāruṇo dāsaśabdaḥ dhiktaducchvasitamupayātu nidhanaṃ dhanam,
GK19bahcar7u:426_1: tiṣṭhatu dūra eva sā śrīḥ śivaṃ sa paricchadaḥ karotu yadarthamuttamāṅgaṃ gā gamiṣyatyaśāpānugrahakṣamastapasvī
GK19bahcar7u:439: varākaḥ sevako 'pi martyamadhye rājilo 'pi vā bhogī,
GK19bahcar7u:441: varaṃ kṣaṇamapi kṛtā mānavatā mānavatā na mato namatastrailokyādhirājyopabhogo 'pi manasvinaḥ /
GK19bahcar7u:442: tadevamabhinanditāsmadīyapraṇayo devo 'pi divasaiḥ katipayaireva parāgataḥ prāgjyotiṣeśvara iti karotu cetasi' ityuktvā tūṣṇīmabhūt /
GK19bahcar7u:446: prabāte ca prabhūtaṃ pratiprābhṛtaṃ pradhānapratidūtādhiṣṭhitaṃ dattvā haṃsavegaṃ prāhiṇot /
GK19bahcar7u:448: kadācittu rājyavardhanabhujabalopārjitamaśeṣaṃ mālavarājasādhanamādāyāgataṃ samīpa evāvāsitaṃ lekhahārakādbhaṇḍimaśṛṇot /
GK19bahcar7u:450: atha bhaṇḍirekenaiva vājinā katipayakulaputraparivṛto malinavāsā ripuśaraśalyapūritena nikhātabahulohakīlakaparikararakṣitasphuṭaneneva hṛdayena,
GK19bahcar7u:467: avanipatirapi dṛṣṭvā tamutthāya praviralaiḥ padaiḥ pratyudgamyotthāpya ca gāḍhamupagūhya kaṇṭhe karuṇamaticiraṃ ruroda /
GK19bahcar7u:473_0: sa punaravādīt--“deva! deva bhūyaṃ gate deve rājyavardhane guptanāmnā ca gṛhīte kuśasthale
GK19bahcar7u:473_1: devī rājyaśrīḥ paribhraśya bandhanādvindhyāṭavīṃ saparivārā praviṣṭeti lokato vārtāmaśṛṇavam /
GK19bahcar7u:474: anveṣṭārastu tāṃ prati prabhūtāḥ prahitā janā nādyāpi nivartante' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:475: taccākarṇya bhūpatirabravīt--“kimanyairanupadibiḥ yatra sā tatra parityaktānyakṛtyaḥ svayamevāhaṃ yāsyāmi /
GK19bahcar7u:481: athāparedyuruṣasyeva bhaṇḍirbhūpālamupasṛtya vyajñāpayat--“paśyatu devaḥ śrīrājyavardhanabhujabalārjitaṃ sādhanaṃ saparibarhaṃ mālavarājasya' iti /
GK19bahcar7u:498: athālocya tatsarvamavanipālaḥ svīkartuṃ yathādhikāramādiśadadhyakṣān anyasmiṃścāhani hayaireva svasāramanveṣṭumuccacāla vindhyāṭavīmavāpa ca parimitaireva prayāṇakaistām /
GK19bahcar7u:519: viśrāmyatkārpaṭikapeṭakaparipāṭīpīyamānapayasāmaṭavīpraveśaprapāṇāṃ śaityena tyājayantamiva graiṣmamūṣmaṇāṃ vkacidanyatra grāhayantamivāṅgārīyadārusaṃgrahadāhibhiḥ vyokāraiḥ,
GK19bahcar7u:526: nāticiroddhṛtānāṃ ca dhātutviṣāṃ dhātakīkusumānāṃ goṇīragaṇitāḥ picavyānāṃ cātasīgaṇapaṭṭamūlakānāṃ puṣkalānsaṃbārān,
GK19bahcar7u:527_1: khadirakāṣṭhānāṃ kuṣṭhasya kaṭhorakesarisaṭābhārababhruṇaśca rodhrasya bhūyaso bhārakān,
GK19bahcar7u:546: iti śrīmahākavibāṇabhaṭṭakṛtau harṣacarite chatralabdhirnāma saptama ucchvāsa
